detectors.description:
RainbowToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RainbowToken.sol#1013-1031) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RainbowToken.sol#1023)
detectors.markdown:
[RainbowToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RainbowToken.sol#L1013-L1031) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RainbowToken.sol#L1023)

detectors.description:
ERC20.constructor(string,string).name (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RainbowToken.sol#483) shadows:
	- ERC20.name() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RainbowToken.sol#492-494) (function)

ERC20.constructor(string,string).symbol (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RainbowToken.sol#483) shadows:
	- ERC20.symbol() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RainbowToken.sol#500-502) (function)

RainbowToken.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RainbowToken.sol#879-920) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(now <= expiry,RAINBOW::delegateBySig: signature expired) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RainbowToken.sol#918)
